member.name: T:drew.Class1
member.summary:
The Class1 class provides a CLS compliant, MWArray interface to the MATLAB functions contained in the files:
D:\Code\Matlab\DLL productor\test1\drew.m

member.name: M:drew.Class1.#cctor
member.summary: The static constructor instantiates and initializes the MATLAB Runtime instance.

member.name: M:drew.Class1.#ctor
member.summary: Constructs a new instance of the Class1 class.

member.name: M:drew.Class1.Finalize
member.summary: Class destructor called by the CLR garbage collector.

member.name: M:drew.Class1.Dispose
member.summary: Frees the native resources associated with this object

member.name: M:drew.Class1.drew
member.summary: Provides a void output, 0-input MWArrayinterface to the drew MATLAB function.
member.remarks: M-Documentation: DREW 此处显示有关此函数的摘要 此处显示详细说明

member.name: M:drew.Class1.drew(System.Int32)
member.summary: Provides the standard 0-input MWArray interface to the drew MATLAB function.
member.remarks: M-Documentation: DREW 此处显示有关此函数的摘要 此处显示详细说明
member.param: The number of output arguments to return.
member.returns: An Array of length "numArgsOut" containing the output arguments.

member.name: M:drew.Class1.WaitForFiguresToDie
member.summary: This method will cause a MATLAB figure window to behave as a modal dialog box. The method will not return until all the figure windows associated with this component have been closed.
member.remarks: An application should only call this method when required to keep the MATLAB figure window from disappearing. Other techniques, such as calling Console.ReadLine() from the application should be considered where possible.
